nodes.text: Grenade launcher was a type of projectile weapon which fired a grenade over great distances to its targeted position.
Stormtrooper grenadiers of the Imperial Stormtrooper Corps were equipped with grenade launchers that fired Class-A thermal detonators.

An Aqualish bounty hunter fought with a grenade launcher during a skirmish on the planet Omereth, killing Nakari Kelen in process. A notably powerful type of grenade launcher was the Relby-v10 micro grenade launcher, the favored weapon of the Trandoshan bounty hunters Cradossk and Bossk.
